quest.name: Do the Chuckle
journal:
 Quest Sync
Deushs Aath seeks to teach the koal the wordless ways of the finless ones.
objectives: Speak with the insatiably curious Ondo.

dialogue.name: DEUSHSAATH
dialogue.text: Finless one, honored guest, a moment of your time. We seek the wisssdom of you and your people.

dialogue.name: DEUSHSAATH
dialogue.text: In the water, there are many ways in which we Ondo may communicate with one another without relying on ssspeech. However, in this new environment of ours, our options are sssomewhat more restricted.

dialogue.name: DEUSHSAATH
dialogue.text: The koal wish to learn other techniques, but I have limited knowledge of such things. Might you speak with this child and demonssstrate for him your methods?

dialogue.name: DEUSHSAATH
dialogue.text: We seek knowledge of how finless ones communicate with one another without words. Show this child, if you would, such techniques as he wishes to learn.

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEA03580
dialogue.text: You have come at a good time, finless one. Might you be so kind as to demonssstrate how you would, without words, beckon me to come to your side?

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEA03580
dialogue.text: I see, I see! Such exaggerated gestures are sure to be easssily understood even over consssiderable distances.

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEA03580
dialogue.text: We are about to embark on a hunt. Perhaps I will be able to employ this new technique to great effect to coordinate our movements...

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEA03580
dialogue.text: There is another of our brethren in the Cups that would benefit from your wisdom. An insssatiably curious Ondo. Please go to him and aid him as you did us.

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEA03580
dialogue.text: No, no, not with your words, finless one! You must beckon me with your most expresssive motions!

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEA03580
dialogue.text: Hmm...I do not understand. Are you certain this is how your people would beckon one another? It feels rather more confusing than I anticipated...

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: Finless one, finless one! You are the one who is teaching Ondo how your kind ssspeaks without words, yes? Tell me then: how would you express delight at another's sssurprisingly amusing antics?

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: With water, one might do so with several spontaneous loops. Without, this “sssomersault” motion becomes rather more difficult. I am told your kind is like to chuckle─what is this? Can you demonssstrate?

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: Oh, I see! It is a shaking of the whole body and a contortion of the face! I think I can replicate this motion...

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: Well? Was it not a near-perfect imitation of the chuckle?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Nay─it was a perfect-perfect imitation!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Honestly, I thought you wanted to eat my face.

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: I knew it! And I owe it all to your excellent instruction. I shall use this new communication technique with pride.

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: Really? But your face is not at all appetizing to me. Hmm... I was so certain that I had captured the esssence of the chuckle, but it seems this will require rather more practice...

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: It was Deushs Aath who first asked you to teach us these techniques, yes? You should return to him and tell him of your efforts. I am sure he will reward you.

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: As for me, I will go and teach others of the chuckle. My thanks to you for this gift, finless one!

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: Does my question amuse you? That is well, but do not say so with words! You must expresss your enthusssiasm in the finless one way! You must chuckle for me!

dialogue.name: ONDOPEOPLEB03580
dialogue.text: Oh? This is what it means to chuckle? Are you sure? It does not seem to quite capture the sense of sssincere but measured delight I was ssstriving to convey...

dialogue.name: DEUSHSAATH
dialogue.text: The koal seem to be in high ssspirits─or perhaps they have grown that skilled at expresssing themselves with the chuckle already? That is all the more reason I have to thank you for our instruction, then.
